articles.title: CPRK Slams Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
CPRK Slams Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Friday released a statement in denunciation of Park Geun Hye's reckless remarks against the DPRK. 
					 Park in her "keynote speech" at the 69th UN General Assembly malignantly pulled up the DPRK over its nukes. She talked such rubbish as the "north is a serious threat to international peace" and south Korea would "support the north in economic development" if it makes a "decision of dismantling its nukes."
					
					 Raising the non-existent "human rights" issue in the DPRK, she ballyhooed about "concern of the international community" and cried out for "taking necessary measures." She went the lengths of letting loose jargons that the international community should pay attention to the human scum despised by everybody and give necessary help to them. 
					
					 The statement branded this as a blatant challenge to the dignity and social system of the DPRK and an extremely dangerous provocation driving the bedeviled north-south relations into a total catastrophe. 
					
					 What she uttered about the north's "decision to dismantle its nukes" is nothing but foolish remarks made by a colonial stooge who is ignorant of the sacred mission and might of nukes in the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Her harangue about "support for the north's economic development" is so ridiculous as to  make even a cat laugh and the accusation made by her against the DPRK over its "human rights" issue is nothing but foolish balderdash of a psychopath bereft of elementary common sense and understanding of human rights. 
					
					 What Park uttered on the UN platform clearly reveals that the call for "confidence" and "improvement of relations" she has made so far is no more than a sheer lie and she is dreaming a foolish dream of achieving "unification through absorption".
					
					 If the puppet forces want confrontation and war, obsessed by "unification through absorption", the DPRK will be compelled to achieve the final victory in the struggle for national reunification by its own mode. It is fully ready to do so.
					
					 The DPRK does not hide the fact that those who hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK will not be able to escape a punishment and its just punishment knows no mercy.
					
					 What Park Geun Hye uttered this time revealed her sinister intention to escalate confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 There is an adage saying the cunning wife makes her husband her apron.
					
					 She malignantly slandered the fellow countrymen in the north even at UN, venomously swishing her skirt in a bid to make troubles wherever she went. This would bring nothing but misfortune and disaster to the nation.
					
					 The world people are spitting at her, disillusioned with this political prostitute and confrontation maniac as she behaves in a capricious way here and there, selling off national interests. Her UN trip fully proved that the one taking her under one's wing would face misfortune only.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon Park Geun Hye for her recent confrontation behavior.
					
					 Whoever hurts the dignity and social system in the DPRK and goes against the aspiration and wishes of the Korean nation will never escape curse and denunciation by all Koreans.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Implement October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Implement October 4 Declaration 
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, indicates the most correct way for boosting the reconciliation and unity, cooperation and exchange between the north and the south and ushering in a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of By Our Nation Itself, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 A bright prospect was opened up thanks to the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration but the relations between the north and the south faced a stumbling block. This is entirely attributable to the anti-reunification actions of the south Korean puppet conservative group which totally denied the north-south declarations and refused to implement them.
					
					 The present conservative ruling forces pay lip service to respect for the north-south agreements, but do not hide their negative stand on implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that they are getting evermore frantic in their criminal leaflets scattering operations against the DPRK by hurling human scum who betrayed the country into "balloon operations".
					
					 Owing to the south Korean authorities' moves to scrap the north-south declarations and their extreme hostile acts against the DPRK, the inter-Korean relations are still in the mire of catastrophe and the confrontation and tension are escalating as the days go by.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly concerned for the dialogue and confidence between the north and the south, they should express their will to respect the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and implement them.
					
					 Whether they implement the north-south declarations or not serves as a touchstone to distinguish whether they stand for improved inter-Korean relations or pursue confrontation

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 Members of the delegation laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 10th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair on Friday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born and spent his childhood, nurturing the great intention of the revolution, they looked round historical relics.
					
					 They went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 Juan Manuel del Valle Torres, head of the delegation of Cuba's LABIOFAM Enterprise Group, said:
					
					  I am deeply recollecting again what an arduous struggle the President fought.
					
					 The struggle of the Korean people who are firmly defending socialism and always emerging victorious in the confrontation with the imperialists would be unthinkable apart from the exploits of the President.
					
					 His exploits will be immortal as he made undying contributions to the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates Leave
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and delegates departed here Friday after taking part in the International Scientific Symposium of Kim Il Sung University. They were the delegation of National University of Mongolia, delegation of People's University of China and other delegations and delegates of various universities of China, delegate of Berlin Free University of Germany, delegate of University of Paris 7 and Russian experts on Korean language.

articles.title: Delegation of Russian Youth League Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Russian Youth League Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation led by Anatoli Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Sportswomen Win Gold Medals in Weightlifting and Gymnastic Events of 17th Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Sportswomen Win Gold Medals in Weightlifting and Gymnastic Events of 17th Asian Games 
 Inchon, September 25 (KCNA Correspondent) -- DPRK sportswomen Kim Un Ju and Kim Un Hyang bagged gold medals in weightlifting and gymnastic events respectively at the 17th Asian Games on Sept. 25.
					 Kim Un Ju lifted 163 kg in the second jerk in the 75 kg category, breaking the Asian record and the one of the Asian Games.
					
					 What she lifted is the same as the previous world record.
					
					 She lifted 164 kg in the third jerk, setting a new world record in jerk.
					
					So she renewed the record of the Asian Games with a total lift of 292 kg.
					
					 Kim Un Hyang successfully performed gymnastic movements requiring high techniques, placing first in the women's balance beam event with the highest points.
					
					 On the same day DPRK players came second in the men's 10 meter moving target team event and Jo Yong Chol in the men's 10 meter moving target individual event. Rim Jong Sim won a bronze medal in the 75 kg category of the women's weightlifting event.

articles.title: Yun I Sang Music Institute Greets 30th Anniversary
articles.content:
Yun I Sang Music Institute Greets 30th Anniversary 
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The 30th founding anniversary of the Yun I Sang Music Institute was marked in the DPRK. 
					 President Kim Il Sung met Yun I Sang several times and highly praised him for creating laudable music pieces with national conscience in a foreign land. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il gave instructions on establishing the Yun I Sang Music Institute and saw to it that the institute turned into a comprehensive music research center capable of playing a big role in developing the music art of the country and conducting the movement for national reunification. 
					
					 Over the past three decades all the officials and employees of the institute have achieved successes in the study of music science, editing and publication, music creation and performing activities.
					
					 A meeting took place at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on Friday. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, officials concerned, officials, employees of the institute and creators and artistes of national art organizations.

articles.title: Pyongyang Int'l Trade Fair Witnesses Diverse Economic and Trade Cooperation
articles.content:
Pyongyang Int'l Trade Fair Witnesses Diverse Economic and Trade Cooperation
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The 10th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair held here on September 22-25 witnessed diverse economic and trade cooperation between the DPRK and foreign countries.
					 It was well evidenced by the increased numbers of participants in the fair. 
					
					 In this regard, Zaytsev Dmitry of the Export Development Center of Primorsky Territory in Russia told KCNA:
					
					 Three companies of the Center have participated in the fair.
					
					 It is first time for me to take part in such big fair held in the DPRK.
					
					 I have seen and learnt a lot. In particular, I think that the economic potentials of the DPRK are great and its economy would be boosted.
					
					 I would do my best to encourage my friends, businessmen and territory administration to make close cooperation with the DPRK enterprises in economic and other fields.
					
					 I am sure that Russia will become a reliable economic and trade partner of the DPRK.
					
					 Edwin Lee, a manager of the Pan Systems PTE Ltd. of Singapore, said:
					
					 We have been here already so many times. But this is first time for me to come to this fair. Freely speaking, I am surprised even for the last day that the crowd is so many. The economy of the country is definitely coming out. Things have changed a lot. I could see that the economy is going to be getting more and more booming.
					
					 Businessmen from Cuba and Malaysia also expressed their pleasure to take part in the fair and their will to make active cooperation with the DPRK in the fields of economy and trade.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Implement Int'l Maritime Instruments
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Implement Int'l Maritime Instruments
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has striven to meet the demand of the International Maritime Organization (IMO) calling upon all its member states to creditably carry out international maritime instruments beneficial to the development of maritime affairs.
					 Jon Ki Chol, deputy director-general of the DPRK's Maritime Administration, said this on World Maritime Day of 2014.
					
					 From the point of view of the status and significance of marine transportation, the DPRK, surrounded by three seas, has made effort to discharge its international legal obligations and responsibility for ensuring the safety of shipping and preserving cleaner marine environment, he noted, adding:
					
					 The country has adopted and implemented such national legislations as "Law of the DPRK on Maritime Superintendence", "Law of the DPRK on Ship Safety" and "Law of the DPRK on Seafarers". 
					
					 With a view to meeting the specific conditions of the country and international levels, the DPRK incorporated the requirements of the "International Ship and Port Facility Security Code" into national legislation and enforced them to all the DPRK-flagged ships and port facilities under its jurisdiction. On the basis of such experience, it is now taking appropriate measures to introduce them to the ships engaged on domestic voyage.
					
					 The country institutionalized the "Pre-sea Inspection System" for the DPRK-flagged ships engaged on international and domestic voyage and enhanced the port State control inspections for foreign-flagged ships entering into its ports to prevent the maritime casualties. 
					
					 The DPRK has set, as one of its essential maritime policies, the prevention of environment pollution in the seas, rivers and lakes. To achieve this goal, it established a national ship oil pollution emergency response system and "Marine Environmental Protection Centre" and "Korea Marine Environmental Protection Fund". As national legislative framework for them, the "Law of the DPRK on the Prevention of Marine Pollution" and the "Regulations on the Prevention of Pollution from Ships" are in force now. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the revision of the "Law of the DPRK on Seafarers" is actively onward to comply with the provisions of international instruments. And the introduction of IMO model courses and assessment of competency for the DPRK seafarers has been improved.
					
					 The DPRK also formed a national maritime search and rescue system which enables it to quickly respond to the distress calls from ships. And it is fully implementing global maritime distress and safety system, long range identification and tracking system of ship and ship security alarm system.
					
					 We will actively engage in the international effort for maritime safety and marine environment protection.

articles.title: CNC-based TEM Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
CNC-based TEM Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Bioengineering Branch and the Intelligent Information Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK manufactured a CNC-based transmission electron microscope (TEM).
					 This TEM makes it possible to examine the surface and internal structure of a sample in a Nano-level accurate way.
					
					 It will be greatly helpful to ensuring precision analysis in such fields as biology, medical science, Nano science and semiconductor engineering.

articles.title: Chongryon Official Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Acts of Treachery
articles.content:
Chongryon Official Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Acts of Treachery
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Choson Sinbo, mouthpiece of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), carried an article contributed by Ri Han Su, permanent advisor to the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, denouncing the south Korean authorities' acts of treachery. 
					 The article accused the south Korean authorities of barring the cheerleading squad of the DPRK from taking part in the 17th Asian Games under various pretexts, terming it "group for political operation in the south" and trick aiming at "creating discord in the south". 
					
					 Noting that the south Korean authorities are deliberately kicking up all sorts of confrontation rackets against the DPRK, the article went on:
					
					 The south Korean warmongers staged Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills, the largest-ever, under the pretext of "annual ones" to create an atmosphere of war. They staged together with the U.S. even a farce of reenacting the Inchon landing operation in Inchon before the opening of the Asian Games.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that on Sept. 21 they let conservative rightwing organizations and human scum scatter leaflets defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system from the area along the Military Demarcation Line. 
					
					 This is the crime bereft of elementary common sense, conscience and morality of human being and intolerable treachery. 
					
					 Behind the curtain of the hideous moves are the Ministry of Unification, Ministry of Defense and Intelligence Service of south Korea and the U.S.
					
					 The article urged the south Korean authorities to stop at once the anti-DPRK psychological warfare. 
					
					 It called upon all Koreans in the north, south and overseas to preserve and implement the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and unite in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself to frustrate the moves of the traitorous, anti-peace, anti-reunification forces and usher in the second June 15 era of reunification as early as possible.

articles.title: Declaration on Situation for Institution of Special Law on Ferry Sewol Published
articles.content:
Declaration on Situation for Institution of Special Law on Ferry Sewol Published 
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Students of Chonnam University of south Korea published a declaration on the situation in demand of the institution of a special law on the ferry Sewol on September 23, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 What the people want is a thorough probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and the prevention of the recurrence of similar disaster, they said, and went on:
					
					 The present chief executive promised the bereaved families this.
					
					 But a special law which can not guarantee the probe into the truth, a law bereft of the right to investigation and indictment, is being pushed forward by the political camp, enraging the bereaved families and other people.
					
					 If the special law without the right to investigation and indictment is instituted, it will be little short of repeating the national investigation into the ferry Sewol that conducted for mere form's sake and the truth behind the loss of more than 300 lives can never be probed.
					
					 It is the "president" herself who should take a decision for the security of the people, they said, urging the chief executive to take responsibility for her remarks and the political camp to come out to institute the law as desired by the bereaved families.

articles.title: Suicide Rate on Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suicide Rate on Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on September 23 deplored the suicide rate on increase in south Korea. 
					 The number of suicides reached more than 14 400 last year and the suicide rate of youth topped the world list.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Suk Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Suk Observed in Guinea
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- There took place a lecture at the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea on Sept. 15 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display at the venue of the event were photos documenting the exploits of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the true picture of the DPRK.
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the institute, said in a lecture on the theme "Brilliant life of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk":
					
					 The life of Kim Jong Suk was brief but she left an indelible trace in the minds of the people.
					
					 During the rigorous anti-Japanese armed struggle she earned her fame as an anti-Japanese war hero by fully displaying superb military wisdom and stratagem, matchless pluck and bravery and marksmanship of never missing targets in many battle fields.
					
					 She visited various parts of the country after its liberation to dynamically arouse the people to the struggle for implementing the President Kim Il Sung's line of nation-building.
					
					 She made distinguished contributions to developing the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular armed forces and consolidating the military foundation for building a new country.
					
					 She devoted her all to the health and safety of the President and resolutely defended his idea and line.
					
					 She is always remembered by the Korean people as an incarnation devotedly defending the leader.

articles.title: Nigerian Personage Accuses U.S. of Its Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
articles.content:
Nigerian Personage Accuses U.S. of Its Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on Sept. 18 assailing the U.S. for its anti-DPRK human rights campaign.
					 He accused the forces hostile to the DPRK of spreading twisted views on the human rights situation in the DPRK.
					
					 The social system in the DPRK guided by the Juche idea is the best popular system as it provides the people with genuine freedom and rights on the basis of the specific conditions of the country and its practical experience by placing people in the center of everything, he noted, adding:
					
					 Some specified countries should not be allowed to encroach upon the sovereignty of other countries by imposing their view on value on them in the international arena and highhanded and arbitrary practices of hegemonic forces should be foiled by concerted efforts.

articles.title: DPRK Photo Exhibition Held in S. Africa
articles.content:
DPRK Photo Exhibition Held in S. Africa
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A DPRK photo exhibition took place in Pretoria City Library, South Africa from Sept. 8 to 13 to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display there were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The venue was visited by personages from all walks of life in South Africa and citizens of Pretoria.
					
					 The visitors praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for sincerely supporting and encouraging the African countries in their struggle for achieving national independence and building a new society.
					
					 They said Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were tender-hearted popular leaders, indeed, adding that under their leadership the DPRK turned into a powerful country.
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people would carve out a happier life, rallied close behind Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia palabras anti-reunificacion de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia palabras anti-reunificacion de Park Geun-hye 
 Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 26 una declaracion condenando a Park Geun-hye del Sur de Corea, que en su "discurso de base" pronunciado en el 69o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, acuso las armas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea RPDC, diciendo que estas constituyen la "severa amenaza a la paz internacional" y que si la RPDC "se decide a renunciarlas", "apoyara el desarrollo de la economia" de esta.
					 Y hablo de que el supuesto problema de "DDHH" de la RPDC es "preocupado por la sociedad internacional" y "es preciso tomar las medidas necesarias" para el particular y de que la sociedad internacional debe prestar atencion y ofrecer apoyo necesario a las escorias humanas menospreciadas por todos.
					
					 Esto es un desafio frontal a la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC y una provocacion que lleva a la fase catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 Denuncia asi el documento y continua:
					
					 Tales palabras de ella pusieron al desnudo que son puras mentiras la "confianza" y la "mejora de las relaciones" de que hablaba tanto ella y que persigue un sueno irrealizable de "la reunificacion mediante la absorbicion".
					
					 Si la banda de titeres surcoreanos, enloquecida en la "reunificacion mediante la absorbicion", quiere la confrontacion y la guerra, nos vemos obligados a valer de nuestro modo propio para lograr la victoria definitiva de la reunificacion de la patria y estamos totalmente listos para eso.
					
					 Exponemos francamente que los ofensivos a nuestra dignidad y regimen no se pueden liberar de nuestro castigo justo e implacable.
					
					 Las presentes fechorias constituyen una declaracion de la confrontacion con la RPDC, ocasion en la cual expuso su intencion malsana.
					
					 La locura de Park causara solo la desgracia y la calamidad de la nacion.
					
					 No perdonaremos jamas la presente locura conflictiva de Park.
					
					 Seran denunciados y condenados por toda la nacion coreana los que insultan la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC y los que se oponen a la aspiracion y la demanda de la nacion.

articles.title: RPDC cumple con sinceridad leyes maritimas internacionales
articles.content:
RPDC cumple con sinceridad leyes maritimas internacionales
 Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se esfuerza para materializar la demanda de la organizacion internacional de que todos los paises miembros cumplan sinceramente las leyes maritimas internacionales.
					 Asi dijo el subtitular del Departamento Estatal de Inspeccion Maritima, Jon Ki Chol, con motivo del Dia Maritimo Mundial de 2014 y continuo:
					
					 Conscientes de la importancia y la posicion del transporte maritimo en Corea banada por el mar en sus tres lados, nos esforzamos por garantizar la seguridad del transporte maritimo, mantener limpia la atmosfera maritima y cumplir otros compromisos asumidos en virtud del derecho internacional.
					
					 En nuestro pais, se aprueban y se cumplen las leyes nacionales inclusive la Ley de la Inspeccion Maritima, la de Seguridad de Barcos y la de Tripulantes.
					
					 Conforme a la situacion detallada del pais y al nivel internacional, legalizamos la exigencia de las reglas internacionales sobre la seguridad de barcos e instalaciones portuarias, las aplicamos a todos los barcos y puertos mercantes y tomamos medidas para introducirlas en los barcos nacionales tambien.
					
					 Al reforzar el control como la ejecucion del regimen de inspeccion antes de la partida sobre todos los barcos internacionales y nacionales, prevenimos de antemano los accidentes en el mar.
					
					 En la RPDC, se toma como politica estatal la prevencion de la contaminacion ambiental en los rios, lagos y mares. Para ello, establecimos el sistema estatal de reaccion emergente a la contaminacion por el combustible de barcos, constituimos y administramos el centro de mediacion de preservacion del ambiente maritimo y el fondo de preservacion del ambiente maritimo de Corea. Como el marco legal necesario a esas labores, entraron en vigor la Ley de Prevencion de la Contaminacion Maritima de la RPDC y la regla de prevencion de contaminacion por el barco.
					
					 Como resultado de la enmienda de la ley de tripulantes segun la demanda del convenio internacional, se mejoran cualitativamente el programa de ensenanza estandarizado y la calificacion de marineros.
					
					 Fue establecido con mas rigor el sistema estatal de investigacion y asistencia maritimas con que se puede reaccionar con rapidez a las senales de auxilio.
					
					 Operan en buen estado los sistemas de la administracion internacional como el sistema mundial de seguridad para los naufragados, el de identificacion y persecucion de los barcos de larga distancia y el de alarma de seguridad de barcos.
					
					 En lo adelante tambien, nos sumaremos a los esfuerzos internacionales por la seguridad maritima y la proteccion del ambiente maritimo.

articles.title: Empresarios extranjeros expresan deseo de activar cooperacion economica y comercial con RPDC
articles.content:
Empresarios extranjeros expresan deseo de activar cooperacion economica y comercial con RPDC
 Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La recien clausurada X Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang mostro bien el desarrollo economico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y relaciones de cooperacion economica y comercial que se diversifica con varios paises y regiones.
					 En comparacion con las citas anteriores, se aumentaron considerablemente el numero de los paises y companias participantes y el de especies y variedades de las mercancias.
					
					 Citado por la ACNC en la exposicion, el funcionario del Centro de Exportacion y Desarrollo del Territorio Litoral de Rusia, Dmitry Zaytsev dijo que en la exposicion participaron tres companias adscritas a su centro.
					
					 Diciendo que participo por primera vez en esta exposicion que se celebra en la RPDC, subrayo que llego a conocer que es muy fuerte la potencialidad economica de la RPDC y que se activara pronto la economia.
					
					 De regreso, lo contare a mis amigos y empresarios asi como al gobierno del territorio litoral para que cooperen activamente con las empresas coreanas en las relaciones economicas y otras esferas, apunto y expreso su conviccion de que Rusia sera fidedigno objeto de cooperacion economica y comercial de la RPDC.
					
					 Edwin Lee, director de la Compania Limitada Pan Systems de Singapur dijo que tuvo varias oportunidades de venir a la RPDC, pero tomo parte por primera vez en la exposicion de mercancias, y prosiguio:
					
					 Pense que el ultimo dia de la exposicion seria tranquilo en comparacion con otros dias, pero me equivoque. Nunca pense en que la exposicion atraeria a tan muchos compradores. Esto facilita imaginar el especto de desarrollo economico de la RPDC.
					
					 Pude sentir que hay muchos cambios en comparacion con hace 10 anos y que se diversificaron las relaciones de cooperacion economica y comercial.
					
					 Estoy convencido de que en un futuro cercano la RPDC alcanzara el crecimiento economico.
					
					 Tambien los empresarios de Cuba y Malasia expresaron la voluntad de activar las labores de cooperacion economica y comercial con RPDC.

articles.title: Conmemoran en RPDC 30o aniversario de fundacion del Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang
articles.content:
Conmemoran en RPDC 30o aniversario de fundacion del Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang
 Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Se ha conmemorado en Corea el 30o aniversario de la fundacion del Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang.
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung se reunio varias veces con Yun I Sang reconociendo que el realizo en el extranjero justas actividades de creacion musical conservando conciencia nacional.
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dio instrucciones sobre la fundacion de dicho instituto y dirigio a acondicionarlo como base general de investigacion cientifica de la musica capaz de cumplir papel importante en el desarrollo musical del pais y en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 Durante 30 anos pasados, todos los funcionarios y empleados del instituto lograron exitos en la investigacion de la musica, la redaccion y publicacion, la creacion musical y las funciones artisticas.
					
					 El acto de informe por el 30o aniversario del instituto tuvo lugar el dia 26 en la Casa Internacional de Cultura de Pyongyang.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam y otros cuadros, los funcionarios y empleados del instituto, los creadores y artistas de las entidades artisticas centrales.
